title: Results of western Europeans in India and China

content.prompt: Which of the following resulted from the arrival of western Europeans in India and China during the time period 1450 to 1750 ?

choices.label: The spread of infectious diseases in India and China and a drastic drop in their populations
The establishment of small European enclaves in India and China
A massive drain of silver and gold from India and China
A great expansion in slave labor in India and China
A major disruption of the economies of India and China

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
